last week of work


--
saturday & sunday


--
playing taylor

sewing on the net on the outside of the pod...

it looks marvelous!


--
monday

usa embassy........... negative vibes!

noise pod picture today:


© by owner

location: stockholm
--
bought tread....... for sewing the net....

red and blue

the personal basic colours and perfect to increase the effect of the net on the rockwool.


--
the thought of a pod looking like it has been mend to look rough and soft at the same time is exactly what I was looking for.

like a nice city!


--
finished with all the work inside and outside to start to put the last part on.
the outside net, which makes the pod more grey looking, takes the feer of the "monster" and gives the outside rockwool a finished look.

domani..

__________________
inspiration link today:
http://bldgblog.blogspot.com/2010/04/ice-manifested-through-sound.html


__________________
noise pod picture today:


© by owner

location: stockholm
--
meeting with karin about the report draft no.2 - some small things to change, and of course make it perfect so it can be sent out on monday...... something to do for this weekend so I don't get bored


--
putting up the rest of the interior!
fake fur is the new black!


--
installing the "light organ" device which finally arrived from switzerland.
now even the light interacts with the noise.
amazing expierience


--
editing all the noise:
on the recordings thehre was a small hiss/noise to hear which I ha to filter away.
thank you audacity! you are great:

1. Noise removal
35 dB
1000 Hz
0.00 s

2. Lowpass
2000 Hz
0.00 dB

3. Normalize


--
meeting with misses noise nina
spend time in the pod. finnaly it is possible to try out how it will be to sit in the pod.
incredible nice!

she gave me some hints and tips how I can organise the selection of noise which you will be able to choose from.
organise them in different categories like:

- outside
- inside
- traffic
- restauration and nightlife
- travel and transportation
- and so on........


--
thinking about the outsides corners and edges......

- like michel gondrys "la sience des rêves".....
- The Augsburger Puppenkiste is a marionette theater in Augsburg, Germany. which has always amazing looking dolls......
- the movie "where the wild things are" is also a good inspiration....
- teddy bear with stitches and patches....

installing the technical parts... friday and saturday

- lights: 3 pieces
- ventilation: 1 fan
- computer: 1 touchscreen computer inside, 1 screen outside


--
done with these pieces......

--
questions today: answers domani
where to put the screen/s?
where to put the speakers?
where to put the fan?
where to put the lamps?
where to put the remaining electric parts?

tomorrow: build in the technic and start with the decorativ parts

© by the owner

location: stockholm
--

i finally made it to stockholm. well with 20 hours delay but i will never forgett this inspiring trip from jfk via kef to arn.


--
halftime presentation of our works today.

went very well. people had hard to understand my process but at least there was a process going on.

got some good input to decide a final shape fro my pod.

seems like everybody works likewise hardly on their project. motivating to work with busy people.


--
afterwork at the country!


--
